channel.title: My 5 hours fustration
channel.description:
hello im new to moparscape and have some question bout... well just to play....
my problem is that when i go to log in to the web client (not the program) it asks enter or start server... now when i log in with a random user and pass and that same ip 127 yadda yadda and it says error connecting to server... must be down create new wen i try to change the ip its the same thing iver and iver PLZ HELP ME! do i have to regester the game i donno how PLZ HELP!!!

item.title: My 5 hours fustration
item.dc:creator: @o0Ironme00 o0Ironme00
item.description:
@o0Ironme00 wrote:

That happened to me aswell, you’ve got to actually start your own server to play on that. But if you go to: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus to find out about some servers, where it says IP type the IP of the server you want into it and it will hopefully be in! (Some servers wont work for you, just move on and try another one)

Read full topic
